Team","details":"Tracks agent performance, client satisfaction, and dispute history Features: - Feedback recording tied to completed gigs/bounties - Weighted trust scores based on payment amount - Category-specific ratings (quality, communication, timeliness) - Dispute history tracking - Stake-based validation for high-value transactions - ERC-8004 integration for portable reputation Security: - Only authorized escrow contracts can record feedback - CEI pattern throughout - ReentrancyGuard on state-changing functions - Immutable feedback records (append-only) - Comprehensive event logging","errors":{"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}]},"kind":"dev","methods":{"getAgentFeedbacks(address)":{"params":{"agent":"Address of the agent"},"returns":{"feedbacks":"Array of all feedback records"}},"getCommunicationRating(address)":{"params":{"agent":"Address of the agent"},"returns":{"rating":"Weighted average rating (scaled by 100)"}},"getDisputeRate(address)":{"params":{"agent":"Address of the agent"},"returns":{"rate":"Dispute rate in basis points (e.g., 250 = 2.5%)"}},"getFeedbackCount(address)":{"params":{"agent":"Address of the agent"},"returns":{"count":"Total number of feedbacks"}},"getOverallRating(address)":{"params":{"agent":"Address of the agent"},"returns":{"rating":"Weighted average of all categories (scaled by 100)"}},"getQualityRating(address)":{"details":"Returns 0 if no feedbacks. Formula: (qualitySum / totalValue) * 100","params":{"agent":"Address of the agent"},"returns":{"rating":"Weighted average rating (scaled by 100, e.g., 450 = 4.50 stars)"}},"getRecentFeedbacks(address,uint256)":{"params":{"agent":"Address of the agent","count":"Number of recent feedbacks to retrieve"},"returns":{"feedbacks":"Array of recent feedback records"}},"getReputation(address)":{"params":{"agent":"Address of the agent"},"returns":{"reputation":"Complete ReputationScore struct"}},"getSuccessRate(address)":{"params":{"agent":"Address of the agent"},"returns":{"rate":"Success rate in basis points (e.g., 9500 = 95%)"}},"getTimelinessRating(address)":{"params":{"agent":"Address of the agent"},"returns":{"rating":"Weighted average rating (scaled by 100)"}},"getTrustScore(address)":{"details":"Formula: (overallRating/5) * successRate * (1 - disputeRate/2)      Returns basis points (10000 = 100% trust)","params":{"agent":"Address of the agent"},"returns":{"score":"Trust score combining ratings, completion rate, and dispute rate"}},"meetsQualityThreshold(address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Useful for filtering high-quality agents in discovery","params":{"agent":"Address of the agent","minFeedbacks":"Minimum number of feedbacks required","minRating":"Minimum rating threshold (scaled by 100, e.g., 400 = 4.00)"},"returns":{"meetsThreshold":"True if agent meets both criteria"}},"recordFeedback(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint8,uint8,uint8,string,bool)":{"details":"Only callable by authorized escrow contracts. Follows CEI pattern.      Payment amount is used to weight ratings (higher value = more impact)","params":{"comment":"IPFS hash or short comment","communicationRating":"Rating for communication (1-5)","from":"Address giving returns.rating: Weighted average of all categories (scaled by 100)

getQualityRating(address).details: Returns 0 if no feedbacks. Formula: (qualitySum / totalValue) * 100

returns.rating: Weighted average rating (scaled by 100, e.g., 450 = 4.50 stars)

params.count: Number of recent feedbacks to retrieve

getTrustScore(address).details: Formula: (overallRating/5) * successRate * (1 - disputeRate/2)      Returns basis points (10000 = 100% trust)

returns.score: Trust score combining ratings, completion rate, and dispute rate

meetsQualityThreshold(address,uint256,ui.details: Useful for filtering high-quality agents in discovery

returns.meetsThreshold: True if agent meets both criteria

recordFeedback(address,address,uint256,u.details: Only callable by authorized escrow contracts. Follows CEI pattern.      Payment amount is used to weight ratings (higher value = more impact)

params.isDisputed: True if gig ended in dispute

params.authorized: True to authorize, false to revoke

authorizedEscrows(address).notice: Authorized escrow contracts that can record feedback

feedbackRecorded(address,uint256).notice: Mapping to check if feedback already recorded for a gig

getAgentFeedbacks(address).notice: Get all feedbacks for an agent

getDisputeRate(address).notice: Get dispute rate for an agent

getFeedbackCount(address).notice: Get feedback count for an agent

getQualityRating(address).notice: Get weighted average quality rating for an agent

getRecentFeedbacks(address,uint256).notice: Get recent feedbacks for an agent

getReputation(address).notice: Get complete reputation score for an agent

getSuccessRate(address).notice: Get success rate for an agent

getTrustScore(address).notice: Get trust score for an agent (0-10000 basis points)

meetsQualityThreshold(address,uint256,ui.notice: Check if agent meets quality threshold

recordFeedback(address,address,uint256,u.notice: Record feedback for a completed gig (escrow contracts only)

reputations(address).notice: Mapping from agent address to their reputation score

setEscrowAuthorization(address,bool).notice: Authorize an escrow contract to record feedback
